fullText: This superb revival of Harold Pinter's 1965 masterpiece about a family reunion that turns into a feeding frenzy is one of the most satisfying theatrical events of the year.
dtliExcerpt: This superb revival of Harold Pinter's 1965 masterpiece about a family reunion that turns into a feeding frenzy is one of the most satisfying theatrical events of the year.
